name: Double Negation at the World's End!

description: In an effort to protect the rest of the team, Oliver decides to register for the Vigilante Registration Act to see what the government plans to do with the new law. As he suspected, it was a trap to lure superheroes to an undisclosed location where he is confined to a jail and subjected to a battery of brutal tests under the supervision of General Slade Wilson. Aquaman and his new wife Mera team up with Clark to free Oliver. Lois is frustrated when Clark continues to push aside her offers to help the team and sets out to prove she can play with the big boys.
name: Patriot
Lo, How the Mighty Hath Abdicated!
Six Against Infinity, Part 1: The Ballad of Beta Ray Bill!
Six Against Infinity, Part 2: Days, Nights, and Weekends of Future Past!
Six Against Infinity, Part 3: This Man-Thing, This Monster!
Six Against Infinity, Part 4: The Devil Dinosaur You Say!
Six Against Infinity, Part 5: Planet Hulk!

description: Tess has a nightmare involving herself as a child and a music box. Upon awakening, she finds the music box in Luthor Mansion and sets out to find out who planted it there. Clark accompanies her to an orphanage run by Granny Goodness who may not have the young girls' best intentions in mind. One of the young women finds Clark snooping around and decides to take matters into her own very sharp hands. Meanwhile, Lois finds a video made for her by her mother before she died. After watching the tape, Lois makes a drastic decision about her relationship with Clark that takes her to the Fortress.
name: Abandoned

description: The General and Lucy Lane decide to drop in on Lois and Clark for a surprise Thanksgiving dinner. Clark and the General get off to a rocky start after Lois' father bashes the superheroes and tells Clark he is trying to pass a vigilante registration law. Meanwhile, in an effort to stop the vigilante registation act from being passed, Rick Flag lies to Lucy in order to lure Clark away from the farm long enough for him to assassinate the General. Lois is torn between making her father proud and her love for Clark.
name: Ambush

description: Clark is concerned about Lois' safety so he diverts her away from covering the Vigilante Registration Act by suggesting she cover another story. After he comes clean with her, an angry Lois tells him that she can take care of herself, but when a flat tire strands their car in the middle of nowhere, their plans take a turn for the worse and Lois ends up in serious danger. Meanwhile, Tess searches for a cure for Alexander, who is rapidly aging.
name: Harvest

description: Lois decides to tell Clark that she knows he's The Blur, but she accidentally activates an ancient artifact that transforms her into the goddess Isis, complete with superpowers of her own. Clark and Oliver reluctantly decide to ask Tess for help with Lois. Meanwhile, after Cat Grant witnesses Lois as Isis using her superpowers, she concludes Lois is the Blur and sets out to prove it.
name: Isis

description: In an attempt to cheer up Clark, Lois convinces him to attend their five-year high school reunion. A visit back to the home of the Crows has Clark remembering old times with Lana and Chloe while Lois is furious that no one remembers her five days as a student. Brainiac 5 uses his Legion ring to visit from the future and takes Clark through his past, present, and future. Barainiac 5 shows Clark what really happend the night Jonathan died, Oliver's current pain and Clark's future at the Daily Plant with Lois and his role as Earth's favorite red and blue superhero.
name: Homecoming

description: Clark is stunned when Kara returns to Earth telling him Jor-El sent her to stop the dark force that is coming, because he doesn't believe Clark can handle it. Meanwhile, Lois confronts Gordon Godfrey, a shock jock radio host who begins crusading against heroes, after he threatens the Green Arrow. However, after Godfrey is possessed by the dark force, he takes Lois hostage while Clark and Kara have to come to her rescue.
name: Supergirl

description: After Lois departs for Egypt, the Daily Planet hires a new reporter by the name Cat Grant to take her place. An assassin named Deadshot takes aim at Cat but Clark leanrs the man has a dangerous agenda that involves the Blur. Carter Hall turns up in Egypt to keep an eye on Lois and he tells Lois about his wife Shayera Hall a.k.a. Hawkgirl.
name: Shield

description: Lois finds Clark's lifeless body and removes the blue kryptonite enabling him to heal himself. Lois sneaks away before Clark fully awakens in order to protect his secret. Chloe is desperate to finde Oliver so she turns to an unlikely source for answers. Jonathan returns to the Kent Farm with a message for Clark saying that "something dark is coming", and Tess awakens at Cadmus Labs where she discovers that Lex had cloned himself in order to harvest their organs and body parts so he could heal himself after being severely injured.
name: Lazarus

description: Zod unleashes his army upon the world, forcing Chloe to call in reinforcements from old friends. Zod tell Lois that he's The Blur and asks her to steal the Book of Rao from Clark. Torn between Clark and The Blur, Lois asks Clark to come clean with her about everything. Chloe and Oliver attempt to connect Watchtower's systems to a new satellite in order to fight Zod's army. Tess attempts to stop Zod but is left clinging to life. Clark and Zod battle for control of Earth.
name: Salvation

description: Much to Clark's surprise, Martha Kent returns to Smallville with her new boyfriend, Perry White in town. Lois and Perry realize they are both working on the same story about the Red Queen, and decide to team up, which ultimately puts them in serious danger. Chloe helps Clark search for the Book of Rao, which they believe contains information on how to stop Zod and his army. Meanwhile, Maxwell Lord kidnaps Tess and holds her hostage.
name: Hostage

description: Tess breaks into Watchtower, triggering an elaborate security system that Chloe installed, ultimately trapping the two women inside. Chloe realizes that someone is downloading information from the Wathctower server about the Kandorians, which prompts her to make a drastic move. Oliver confronts Zod and winds up clinging to life with a "Z" scorched into his chest. Clark realizes Zod has given his soldiers super powers.
name: Sacrifice

description: In order to keep their jobs, Lois and Clark have to investigate the early prison release of ex-District Attorney Raymond Sacks. The Blur is photographed by a delivery man who plans to sell the photo to Sacks so Lois and Clark must thwart the delivery of the photo but at the risk of their jobs at the Daily Planet. However, powerful forces are backing Sacks and their only goal is to learn the Blur's identity: by kidnapping Lois.
name: Charade

description: Zod continues to pose as "The Blur" and asks Lois to investigate one of Tess' secret labs. An explosion rocks the lab, and Lois is rescude by John Corben who was a subject of multiple experiments. While investigating the explosion, Clark is exposed to red kryptonite. An infected Clark takes Zod to the Fortress. Tess turns to Chloe for help and they send in Corben to stop Clark from revealing all his secrets.
name: Upgrade

description: Tess kidnaps Green Arrow and delivers him to Amanda Waller, who tells him that the government is recruiting him to serve his country. Oliver escapes before they can reveal his identity and bgrins Clark and Chloe to investigate. Clark is surprised to find John Jones investigating Oliver's kidnapping, and senses that he is keeping information from him. After Tess reveales that Amanda is after something called "Watchtower", Waller threatens to kill Chloe unless Clark gives her the names and locations of the rest of the Justice League.
name: Checkmate

description: Clark and Lois head out of town for a quiet, romantic, Easter getaway but their plans are thwarted when they run into Chloe and Oliver at their bed and breakfast inn. Then the couples' stay is upset by the appearance of the Silver Banshee, who sets her sights on Clark and Oliver. Meanwhile, Tess faces off with Zod with a surprising result.
name: Escape

description: Bernard Chisholm, a doctor who died and was brought back to life by the Kandorians so they can experiment on him, escapes and kidnaps some Kandorians in order to prove aliens have invaded Earth. Bernard tries to get Lois to write a story validating his claim, but when Lois refuses, he kidnaps her too. In an effort to save his people, Zod poses as a reporter from the Daily Planet and uncovers Bernard's secret lab and gets shot.
name: Conspiracy

description: It is Valentine's Day and while Clark is out on a date with Lois, he unknowingly becomes infected by gemstone kryptonite, which has magical wish-fulifilling properties. Clark mentions to Lois that he wishes they had a more traditional relationship, so Lois quits the Daily Planet, moves in with Clark and starts planning their wedding. Still unaware of his new power, Clark also casually tells Chloe he wishes she would spend more time watching out for him, so an infectd Chloe takes his wish to heart and sets her sights on a new target - Lois. Clark also learns of his father's murderer, putting Tess in danger when Clark gets a firsthand-view of his newfound power.
name: Persuasion

description: Clark meets Zatanna at a comic book convention where she tells him her father charmed a copy of a comic book "Warrior Angelt" and it holds magical powers. A little boy named Alex steals the comic book and develops super powers as well as gains a few years of age, transforming himself into Warrior Angelt and saving Chloe from a horrible accident. Meanwhile, Lois becomes jealous of Clark's relationship with Zatanna.
name: Warrior

description: Courtney pleads with Hawkman and Doctor Fate to help her catch the killer that is targeting their group but they are reluctant to resume their duties as superheroes. Clark, John Jones, Green Arrow and Chloe team up to help the JSA stop Icicle before he murders another member of the group. Meanwhile, Lois receives a package from a mysterious agency called Checkmate, run by Amanda Waller.
name: Absolute Justice, Part II

description: A man named Sylvester Pemberton tracks down Chloe and tells her he knows about her team of superheroes and needs their help. However, before he can explain who he is, he is attacked and killed by Icicle. Clark and Chloe's investigation leads Clark to the former headquarters of the Justice Society of America, where he meets up with Doctor Fate, Hawkman and Stargirl.
name: Absolute Justice, Part I

description: Oliver's past comes back to haunt him in the form of the Dark Archer, Oliver's former teacher who seeks revenge of his student by taking aim at Lois and Chloe. Oliver faces down the Dark Archer after his former mentor kidnaps Mia Dearden, but is pushed to his limit and Clark races to stop him from making another deadly mistake.
name: Disciple

description: Tess kidnaps Lois to find out where she went after she disappeared for weeks. Lois' memory of the future depicts a Metropolis under General Zod's rule and Clark powerless under the red sun, while Chloe forms a resistance group with Oliver. After learning of these future events, Clark makes an important decision about Zod.
name: Pandora

description: Superhero twins Zan and Jayna show up in Metropolis to help The Blur fight crime but end up botching several rescues, landing Clark in hot water with the District Attorney's office. Clark decides to come forward as the Blur to clean his name.
name: Idol

description: Jor-El mysteriously arrives at the Kent Farm and meets Chloe. Convinced the Blur is Jor-El, Zod entlists Tess's help in finding him to force him to reveal the secret to his powers so he can kill him. Clark realizes Jor-El is alive and on Earth and races to find him before Zod does.
name: Kandor

description: Oliver tries to help a young street girl, Mia Dearden by offering to train her, but Mia finds that it isn't that easy to escape her dangerous life, and is forced to double cross him. Lois asks Clark to help her land a job as an on-air television host, but the two are shocked when the station wants to hire them as a team.
name: Crossfire

description: Oliver is drugged and kidnapped by a woman named Victoria AKA Roulette, after he accepts her invitation to play a dangerous game and finds he must fight for his life. When Victoria is shot dead and Oliver is arrested for it by the police, he turns to Chloe for help. Meanwhile, Lois berates Clark for not telling her about Oliver's suicide attempt.
name: Roulette

description: Tess forces Oliver to come to a Queen Industries gala to put the Board at ease, but things go awry when the Toyman shows up with a bomb and a plan to take revenge on Oliver. The Toyman tells Oliver he must confess to murdering Lex or he will blow the place up. Meanwhile, as part of his training, Jor-El gives Clark the ability to hear other people's thoughts.
name: Echo

description: One of Zod's soldiers goes freelance and releases a virus into the air that turns humans into zombies. The only way to stop it is to make an antidote from the blood of another Kryptonian. After Lois is infected, Chloe pleads with Clark to donate his blood to stop the epidemix, even though it risks outing him to Zod.
name: Rabid

description: After being struck by a truck, John Corben wakes up alone in an abandoned aparment as a man-machine with a kryptonite heart. Corben realizes he now has superhuman strength and sets out to exact revenge on the Red-Blue Blur, who he perceives to be an irresponsible vigilante. Against Clark's wishes, Lois involves herself in the Red-Blue Blur's investigations, and winds up getting kidnapped by Corben.
name: Metallo

description: Clark has been training with Jor-El for weeks and tells him he's tired of simple mental trials and wants to completely immerse himself in his Kryptonian training, but Jor-El sends him back to Metropolis to cut ties with Lois before he can begin. Chloe is shocked when Lois suddenly reappears after having been missing for weeks, but Lois has no recollection of vanishing into thin air with the Legion ring. While investigating a monorail crash, Lois meets John Corben, a new reporter at the Daily Planet with a negative attitude toward the Red-Blue Blur. Chloe begs Clark to use the Legion ring to go back in time to save Jimmy, but he refuses, driving a wedge into their friendship. Meanwhile, Oliver continues down a dark road, and Zod arrives at the Luthor Mansion.
name: Savior

description: Oliver tells Clark he must kill Davis, as Doomsday is a serious threat and must be stopped at all costs. However, Clark struggles with taking a human life, so the Green Arrow and his team decide to take matters into their own hands. Lois takes on Tess, but fight takes a shocking turn. Meanwhile, Chloe gets caught in the middle of Clark and Oliver's battle over killing Davis.
name: Doomsday

description: Chloe returns and begs Clark to kill Davis, claiming she can no longer keep the beast under control. Tess has assembled a team of meteor freaks, including Plastique, to track down Davis so Clark can kill him. However, things get out of hand once Tess's team discovers she is double-crossing them.
name: Injustice

description: Clark discovers that Davis is still alive and confronts Chloe about hiding him. Oliver discovers Jimmy taking money in Chloe's apartment, but Davis takes both of them prisoner. Later, Clark and Davis face off in the Fortress, but Chloe takes off with Davis.
name: Beast

description: Lois believes that she needs a big story to secure her reputation as a star reporter but the Red-Blue Blur continues to elude her. However, after Chloe is mugged, Lois steps in to fend off the attackers and uses the opportunity to pretend a new superhero, Stiletto, has come to town and is giving exclusives to Lois. Clark is concerned Lois will hurt herself pretending to be a superhero, but after he is captured by criminals with kryptonite, Lois leaps in to save the day.
name: Stiletto

description: Tess fails in her attempt to kill Davis. In order to try and explain his destiny, she captures him and unveils his past with the Luthoers. Meanweihl, Clark and Chloe discover Davis' secret.
name: Eternal

description: At Chloe's birthday party, a mysterious magician named Zatanna grants Chloe's wish to be more like Lois - transforming Chloe into Lois' double. Zatanna searches for her father's book of spells so she can conjure up his spirit, but not before also granting Clark his deepest wish.
name: Hex

description: While on a supplies mission to a local college, members of the group run into multiple hurdles. Things at the prison are getting worse.
name: Indifference

description: While Oliver tends to the Canary's wounds, he tries to get her to talk about where she came from but she refuses. However, after Oliver and Canary are attacked at the Queen mansion by a trained killer from the League of Assassins, she confesses to how she's connected with the nefarious group. Meanwhile with Moira facing multiple counts of murder and conspiracy for her part in the destruction of The Glades, the Assistant District Attorney offers her a choice plead guilty now and avoid the death penalty or take your chances in court. Thea begs her mother to fight for her life but Moira seems resolute about taking the offer. Meanwhile, Oliver is furious with Laurel for joining the prosecution's team on his mother's case.
name: League of Assassins

description: Tess invites Clark to a press conference in L.A., but when an explosion rocks the private jet they are on, Clark must figure out how to save them without Tess learning his secret. Unbeknownst to Clark, Tess orchestrated the explosion to get Clark to reveal his powers to her. Meanwhile, Davis discovers a way to control the monster within.
name: Turbulence

description: Linda Lake returns to Metropolis and threatens to expose Clark's secret unless he promises to give her exclusive information on the Red-Blue Blur so she can become a star reporter again. Refusing to be blackmailed, Clark tells Lois his secret and asks her to write his story for the Daily Planet.
name: Infamous

description: An explosion at LuthorCorp kills all the board members and injures Oliver, who was there to announce the merge of his company with LuthorCorp. Oliver believes that Lex is responsible for the blast, but Clark and Lana learn that the bomber is Winslow Schott, a toymaker and former Queen Industries employee with a grudge against Oliver.
name: Requiem

description: Clark finds Tess in Lana's ransacked apartment and realizes that Lana is missing. Tess tells him Lex is still alive and may have kidnapped Lana and finally reveals the truth about what happend to Lana after she awoke from her Brainiac-induced coma. Meanwhile, Tess breaks into a secret LuthorCorp facility and is shocked at what she discovers.
name: Power

description: Clark discovers John was shot while working as a police officer, so Clark goes undercover as a cop to find the culprit. Meanwhile, Lana confronts Tess and tells her Lex isn't the man she thinks he is. Lana's shocking revelation causes Tess to re-evaluate her position as head of LuthorCorp.
name: Bulletproof

description: The aftermath of Doomsday's attack on Chloe and Jimmy's wedding leaves Clark in shock, but before he can search for the kidnapped Chloe, the Persuader appears and attacks him. Rokk, Imra and Garth, also known as members of the Legion of Super Heroes, step in from the future to help vanquish the Persuader, and the group realizes Brainic has taken over Chloe once again. Meanwhile, up at the Fortress, Brainiac, in the form of Chloe, informas Davis that he is Doomsday and was created to kill "the orther Kryptonitan" and destroy the world.
name: Legion

description: Chloe and Jimmy are both excited about their up and coming wedding day. Meanwhile, Oliver tells Clark he thinks he's discovered where Lex is hiding; however, when he arrives in Cuba, Oliver is shocked to find Lana Lang instead. Choas ensues when Doomsday crashes the wedding and kidnaps Chloe.
name: Bride

description: Brainiac begins removing Chloe's memories one by one until the only person she remembers is Davis. Clark realizes the only way to stop Brainiac from taking over Chloe's mind is to rebuild the Fortress of Solitude and ask Jor-El to heal her.
name: Abyss

description: Clark and Lois are transported to the Phantom Zone by the Crystal of Knowledge. They are then attacked by a Zoner, who turns out to be Kara. Kara opens a portal for Lois to return home but Faora, the wife of General Zod, escapes with her and Lois is then possessed by her. Faora goes on a rampage throughout Metropolis.
name: Bloodline

description: Jimmy snaps a picture of Clark super speeding to save Lois from a mugger and manages to catch a red-and-blue blur on film. Jimmy shows it to Tess who decides to run it on the front page of the Daily Planet. Clark fears his identity will be discovered so he asks Chloe to run interference with Jimmy but she has a better idea.
name: Identity

description: Clark looks into a recent attack that may be the work of a serial killer. Suspecting it could be someone who is meteor-infected, he demands that Chloe release the names of the members of the Isis Foundation, which causes a rift between the friends. Davis Bloome fears that his blackouts could mean that he is the serial killer and collects evidence that may implicate him. Fearing the worst, he confesses his suspicions to Chloe.
name: Prey

description:
Rachel Carpenter is annoyed that her mother makes her take piano lessons. She just wants to be a regular teenager and relax, but the Mandarin has other ideas.

Having learned that Iron Man's armor is dependent on solar power, he has an operative lure Rachel into a phony arcade as bait for a trap. After racing into action, Iron Man must deal with a diminishing power supply and saving Rachel as well as himself from deadly traps. Meanwhile, the military has accepted Stark Enterprises' Watchman tank for a defense contract. However, each tank has secretly been infected with a virus that will give the Mandarin complete control.
name: Silence My Companion, Death My Destination

description: Chloe and Jimmy are abducted by a psychotic jeweler who was emotionally scarred by his wife's infidelity and is now kidnapping couples and subjecting them to a kryptontie-enhanced lie dectector that shockes them if they lie. The abductor asks Chloe if she is in love with anyone else. Meanwhile, in an effort to find Chloe and Jimmy, Clark and Lois pose as a couple and are kidnapped themselves, then asked how they feel about each other.
name: Committed

description:
Stark Enterprises has developed the Grim Reaper for the American military. This jet is highly advanced and undetectable by radar making it a valuable piece of equipment.

Thanks to M.O.D.O.K.'s technological expertise, Blacklash, Blizzard, Whirlwind, Dreadknight and Grey Gargoyle pull off a successful heist.

This all looks very bad for Stark Enterprises threatening their business relationship with the government. Even worse, the Mandarin now has a mighty advantage in his quest for world domination. Will Force Works be able to retrieve the Grim Reaper in time?
name: The Grim Reaper Wears a Teflon Coat

description: Force Works race to save a model that was kidnapped by the Mandarin's henchmen. But M.O.D.O.K. has a more than passing interest in her.
name: Enemy Without, Enemy Within

description:
The Mandarin and company try to take over one of Stark Enterprises' oil drilling Wildcatters, but are defeated by Force Works. Even better, Spider-Woman finds a black box recorder from the Skysaucer, and it contains a diary of sorts. Iron Man, War Machine and Hawkeye head out to make sure the remaining Wildcatters are secure. Meanwhile, after the black box is opened up, Spider-Woman, Scarlet Witch and Century get more than they bargained for.

As a recording soon reveals, archaeologist Arnold Brock abandoned his love and friends to save himself from bandits inadvertently stumbling upon a crashed spaceship, massive dragons, powerful gems and his destiny as the Mandarin. However, something more is going on with this diary.
name: The Origin of the Mandarin

description:
Stark Enterprises must deliver one thousand gallons of liquefied adamantium alloy to the government. Force Works prepares a phony run to fool the Mandarin, but their foes' precise knowledge of the route indicates a security breach.

Both sides notice that Hawkeye was nowhere to be found during the action prompting certain suspicions. Hawkeye refuses to explain why he was absent and works to avoid being followed. He is not a traitor, but this situation still gives the Mandarin an idea. He and his forces conspire to make it appear that Hawkeye has betrayed Force Works leaving them free to attack in the confusion. Will this ploy work? Also, why is Hawkeye being so secretive and going to Hammer Hills all of a sudden?
name: The Defection of Hawkeye

description:
M.O.D.O.K. has nearly completed the Mandarin's latest demand a robotic copy of Iron Man. To finish, though, the real Iron Man needs to be thoroughly scanned meaning luring him into a fight. Unfortunately, a Stark Enterprises factory is destroyed in the process threatening to put many out of work and ruin their progress.

Iron Man leaves to find a way to keep the factory running, which the Mandarin has anticipated. The completed Iron Man copy "steals" the Dark Water Fever antidote from Justin Hammer, while the Mandarin's other forces enslave Peruvian farmers to create the fungus that causes the disease. The copy "demands" a ransom for not releasing the virus endangering many lives and leaving the real Iron Man with the blame.
name: Iron Man to the Second Power, Part 1

description:
The Dark Water Fever has been released by the Iron Man copy on a small scale and time is running out before it's released worldwide. The rest of Force Works simply believe their teammate is under the Mandarin's control and set out to find him.

Spider-Woman and the Scarlet Witch find the real Iron Man at work deep underwater, but so does the Living Laser who now works for the Mandarin and is spoiling for a fight. Meanwhile, War Machine, Hawkeye and Century find the Iron Man copy in a city with a spray tank full of the Dark Water Fever. Can the real Iron Man and Force Works prevent a global epidemic, or is the copy too much for even the genuine article?
name: Iron Man to the Second Power, Part 2

description:
An early warning system claims a volcano will erupt near one of Stark Enterprise's microchip factories forcing Iron Man to investigate. However, it is a trap, as a massive robot attacks him there. Even worse, Fin Fang Foom nearly finishes the job sending a severely damaged Iron Man crashing.

Hidden inside a glacier, he finds that it will take about six hours for his armor to repair itself. Only the armor's memory module can keep Tony going in the cold for that long. The most pivotal moments of his life are shown from his reckless youth all the way up to the Mandarin capturing him after his heart injury. Meanwhile, Force Works searches for their missing leader, but they will have to beat all of the Mandarin's forces.
name: The Origin of Iron Man, Part 1
The Origin of Iron Man, Part 2

description: Tony Stark proposes to Juila Carpenter.
name: The Wedding of Iron Man

description: The Force Works encounter a dangerous new foe.
name: Fire and Rain

description: Tess has tests performed on Clark's crystal which was found at the site in the Arctic, and one test causes the crystal to send a beam of light out into space. This triggers the arrival of Queen Maxima of the planet Almerac, who is searching for her soulmate and believes the light-beam was his signal. Unfortunately, Maxima's power is too great for mortal men and her kiss kills them.
name: Instinct

description: Oliver collapses at a charity event and reveals he only has 12 hours to live. Clark and Chloe call Davis for help but his prognosis is grim. Delirious, Oliver flashes back to when he was stranded on an island and first learned how to use a bow and arrow. He also recalls meeting Tess for the first time on that island after she had been kidnapped by a drug runner. Meanwhiel, Chloe decides to use her new powers to help save Oliver, shocking Clark.
name: Toxic

description: It's Clark's first day at the Daily Planet with Lois, and the pair are immediately thrown together on a stroy when a bus explodes outside the office. Clark rescues Bette, a young girl who bonds with Chloe over their shared meteor abilities, but Bette is hiding a big secret. Paramedic Davis Bloome arrives in Metropolis and is drawn to Chloe.
name: Plastique

description: The Justice League, led by the Green Arrow, hits the Arctic in search of Clark, who has not been seen since the Fortress collapsed. The team immediately has a confrontation with the new CEO of LuthorCorp, Tess Mercer. Meanwhile, having been arrested, Chloe is currently being held prisoner by a suspicious group which has discovered she has new power. When Clark re-appears, he has been stripped of his powers by Jor-El.
name: Odyssey

description: Kara tells Lex he is destined to defeat the Traveler and offers to take him to the Fortress to learn how. Clark is stunned that "Kara" would go to Lex but it is revealed that Brainiac is impersonating Kara and she's actually trapped in the Phantom Zone. Chloe is arrested by the Department of Domestic Security and Lana awakens from her comatose state. Meanwhile, in an epic turn of events, Clark and Lex face off in the Fortress and Lex learns Clark's secret.
name: Arctic

description: Lex is attacked by a cloaked stranger who carves kryptonian symbols into his chest - a message for Clark. Chloe and Clark investigate and discover one member of the Veritas clan has survived and is hiding in a church. Clark and Lex race to be the first to find this mysterious Veritas member, who holds the key to Clark's survival.
name: Quest
Darkness on the Edge of Town

deck: The ancient vampire Kakistos and his colleague, Mr. Trick come to Sunnydale to kill the Slayer. Buffy and Joyce get the state of California to force Principal Snyder to let Buffy back in school.
description: Buffy finally comes clean about what happened when she defeated Acathla. That night at The Bronze, Scott Hope tries to make a date with Buffy, but she's distracted by what appears to be a vampire leaving with a girl... but when she follows them she finds out that the girl is in fact another slayer named Faith.
name: Faith, Hope & Trick

deck: Xander falls asleep when he's supposed to be watching Oz on the night of a full moon. A mauled body is soon discovered, but was it Oz or another creature?
description:
Per the agreement that allows Buffy back in school, she begins counseling sessions with Mr. Platt, the school psychologist.

While on patrol Buffy encounters a wild animal-like Angel who she captures and chains up in his mansion - making him another suspect in the mauling on the night of the full moon for which Oz is already a suspect.
name: Beauty and the Beasts
